verses.verse: Now it came <S%H1961><s%> about after <S%H310><s%> the death <S%H4194><s%> of Moses <S%H4872><s%> the servant <S%H5650><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> that the Lord <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H559><s%> to Joshua <S%H3091><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Nun, <S%H5126><s%> Moses' servant, <S%H8334><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

"Moses <S%H4872><s%> My servant <S%H5650><s%> is dead; <S%H4191><s%> now <S%H6258><s%> therefore arise, <S%H6965><s%> cross <S%H5674><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> Jordan, <S%H3383><s%> you and all <S%H3605><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> people, <S%H5971><s%> to the land <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I am giving <S%H5414><s%> to them, to the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

"Every <S%H3605><s%> place <S%H4725><s%> on which <S%H834><s%> the sole <S%H3709><s%> of your foot <S%H7272><s%> treads, <S%H1869><s%> I have given <S%H5414><s%> it to you, just <S%H9201><s%> as I spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Moses. <S%H4872><s%>

"From the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> and this <S%H2088><s%> Lebanon, <S%H3844><s%> even as far <S%H5704><s%> as the great <S%H1419><s%> river, <S%H5104><s%> the river <S%H5104><s%> Euphrates, <S%H6578><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of the Hittites, <S%H2850><s%> and as far <S%H5704><s%> as the Great <S%H1419><s%> Sea <S%H3220><s%> toward the setting <S%H3996><s%> of the sun, <S%H8121><s%> will be your territory. <S%H1366><s%>

"No <S%H3808><s%> man <S%H376><s%> will [be able to] stand <S%H3320><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you all <S%H3605><s%> the days <S%H3117><s%> of your life. <S%H9132><s%> Just <S%H9201><s%> as I have been <S%H1961><s%> with Moses, <S%H4872><s%> I will be with you; I will not fail <S%H7503><s%> you or forsake <S%H5800><s%> you.

"Be strong <S%H2388><s%> and courageous, <S%H553><s%> for you shall give <S%H5157><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> possession <S%H5157><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I swore <S%H7650><s%> to their fathers to give <S%H1><s%> them.

"Only <S%H7534><s%> be strong <S%H2388><s%> and very <S%H3966><s%> courageous; <S%H553><s%> be careful <S%H8104><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%> according to all <S%H3605><s%> the law <S%H8451><s%> which <S%H834><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> My servant <S%H5650><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> you; do not turn <S%H5493><s%> from it to the right <S%H3225><s%> or to the left, <S%H8040><s%> so <S%H4616><s%> that you may have <S%H7919><s%> success <S%H7919><s%> wherever <S%H3605><s%> <S%H834><s%> you go. <S%H1980><s%>

"This <S%H2088><s%> book <S%H5612><s%> of the law <S%H8451><s%> shall not depart <S%H4185><s%> from your mouth, <S%H6310><s%> but you shall meditate <S%H1897><s%> on it day <S%H3119><s%> and night, <S%H3915><s%> so <S%H4616><s%> that you may be careful <S%H8104><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%> according to all <S%H3605><s%> that is written <S%H3789><s%> in it; for then <S%H227><s%> you will make <S%H6743><s%> your way <S%H1870><s%> prosperous, <S%H6743><s%> and then <S%H227><s%> you will have <S%H7919><s%> success. <S%H7919><s%>

"Have I not commanded <S%H6680><s%> you? Be strong <S%H2388><s%> and courageous! <S%H553><s%> Do not tremble <S%H6206><s%> or be dismayed, <S%H2865><s%> for the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> is with you wherever <S%H3605><s%> <S%H834><s%> you go. <S%H1980><s%>"
Then Joshua <S%H3091><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> the officers <S%H7860><s%> of the people, <S%H5971><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

"Pass <S%H5674><s%> through the midst <S%H7130><s%> of the camp <S%H4264><s%> and command <S%H6680><s%> the people, <S%H5971><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> 'Prepare <S%H3559><s%> provisions <S%H6720><s%> for yourselves, for within <S%H5750><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> you are to cross <S%H5674><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> Jordan, <S%H3383><s%> to go <S%H935><s%> in to possess <S%H3423><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> is giving <S%H5414><s%> you, to possess <S%H3423><s%> it.'"
And to the Reubenites <S%H7206><s%> and to the Gadites <S%H1425><s%> and to the half-tribe of Manasseh, <S%H4519><s%> Joshua <S%H3091><s%> said, <S%H559><s%>

"Remember <S%H2142><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> which <S%H834><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> the servant <S%H5650><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> you, saying, <S%H559><s%> 'The Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> gives <S%H5117><s%> you rest, <S%H5117><s%> and will give <S%H5414><s%> you this <S%H2088><s%> land. <S%H776><s%>'

"Your wives, <S%H802><s%> your little <S%H2945><s%> ones, <S%H2945><s%> and your cattle <S%H4735><s%> shall remain <S%H3427><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> you beyond <S%H5676><s%> the Jordan, <S%H3383><s%> but you shall cross <S%H5674><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> your brothers <S%H251><s%> in battle <S%H2571><s%> array, <S%H2571><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> your valiant <S%H2428><s%> warriors, <S%H1368><s%> and shall help <S%H5826><s%> them,

until <S%H5704><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> gives <S%H5117><s%> your brothers <S%H251><s%> rest, <S%H5117><s%> as [He gives] you, and they also <S%H1571><s%> possess <S%H3423><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> is giving <S%H5414><s%> them. Then you shall return <S%H7725><s%> to your own <S%H3425><s%> land, <S%H776><s%> and possess <S%H3423><s%> that which <S%H834><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> the servant <S%H5650><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> you beyond <S%H5676><s%> the Jordan <S%H3383><s%> toward the sunrise. <S%H4217><s%> <S%H8121><s%> "

And they answered <S%H6030><s%> Joshua, <S%H3091><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "All <S%H3605><s%> that you have commanded <S%H6680><s%> us we will do, <S%H6213><s%> and wherever <S%H413><s%> <S%H3605><s%> <S%H834><s%> you send <S%H7971><s%> us we will go. <S%H1980><s%>

"Just <S%H3605><s%> <S%H834><s%> as we obeyed <S%H8085><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> in all <S%H3605><s%> things, <S%H3605><s%> so <S%H3651><s%> we will obey <S%H8085><s%> you; only <S%H7534><s%> may the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> be with you, as He was with Moses. <S%H4872><s%>

"Anyone <S%H3605><s%> <S%H376><s%> who <S%H834><s%> rebels <S%H4784><s%> against <S%H854><s%> your command <S%H6310><s%> and does not obey <S%H8085><s%> your words <S%H1697><s%> in all <S%H3605><s%> that you command <S%H6680><s%> him, shall be put <S%H4191><s%> to death; <S%H4191><s%> only <S%H7534><s%> be strong <S%H2388><s%> and courageous. <S%H553><s%>"
